__e: "'Now, I know thou art a man and a man's cub no longer.
I'm gonna talk to this man that thinks it's okay to date a high school girl.
I try to talk to her, you know, ever since the divorce as much as I can on-on the horn and in person, but 15-year-old kid. You know, they always got a million things going on.
I didn't have the first idea how to raise a child.
It's not what you're bred for either, it would appear.
If I was that mother, I'd rather have a half dead kid than watch someone else raise my flesh and blood.
And we're having a great time, but you're a kid and I never want you to forget that.
Luckily, she's just a kid and she doesn't know anything about us and what we're up to.
Oh, last time I seen you, you was a kid, and now you officially got one of your own.
